reference.title: cxxDefine module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe a define.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxDefine> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name of the define, the define syntax, and the usage description of the define. This topic type module also contains all the elements necessary to describe the component variables and functions.
The cxxDefine topic contains the following elements:
